title: Aimbotting
body:
How do you ensure someone gets banned for aimbottin? I closed it as he said in the lobby after the game "report me they don't ban for botting" after the game. He made some skill shots pros would not be able to make. Most obvious aimbot I've ever seen. I reported him normally but didint know if there was another way to get it seen.

Thanks.

replies.body:
Reports can help bring attention to something, but scripts like that will be detected automatically whenever they interfere with the game.

If you're worried your report wasn't sent successfully, send over any replay you have showing the aimbot in action so we can take a look.
